title: That viral photo of a cloud that looks like a skull was taken from a heavy metal album cover
subtitle: A picture which shows a skull which looks like a cloud in California has been faked. The cloud is taken from an Iron Maiden album cover.
author: fullfact.org
vclaim:
That viral photo of a cloud that looks like a skull was taken from a heavy metal album cover

A photo on Facebook shared over 140,000 times claims to show a “real picture taken in California” of an ominous-looking skull-shaped cloud.

The picture has been edited to include the skull from the cover of Iron Maiden’s 2000 album ‘Brave New World’.

This article is part of our work fact checking potentially false pictures, videos and stories on Facebook. You can read more about this—and find out how to report Facebook content—here. For the purposes of that scheme, we’ve rated this claim as false as the image is fake.
